message: I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product for a price that I think is fair considering its worth to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1400000. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better offer elsewhere.
I appreciate your offer, but I was hoping we could meet in the middle. I'm willing to pay $1300000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its worth to me.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm afraid $1300000 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $1350000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I think it's a fair price considering the product's worth to you.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1320000, but that's as high as I can go. I hope we can meet in the middle again.

I appreciate your flexibility, but $1320000 is still a bit below my target. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $1325000. This is the final offer I'm willing to make, and I think it's a fair price considering the product's worth to you.
I understand that you're trying to make a profit, but I'm really close to my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can only go up to $1312500. I hope we can come to an agreement.
